Immobilizing_Dart.display_help: Immobilizing Darts do minor toxic damage over time and weakens your foe's legs. They will either be entirely unable to move, or severely slowed down. Damage: Minor(DoT). Recharge: Fast
Immobilizing_Dart.display_target_help: You have been hit by an Immobilizing Dart. You are either slowed down or entirely immobilized.

Sting_of_the_Wasp.display_help: You perform a standard attack with your Ninja Blade. Sting of the Wasp can reduce a target's Defense, making them easier to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Sting_of_the_Wasp.display_target_help: The Ninja Blade has reduced your Defenses.

Choking_Powder.display_help: Toss a fistful of toxic powder at an enemy’s face. This powder will temporarily close the affected foe’s throat making them choke and struggle to grasp for air. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Choking_Powder.display_target_help: The Soot is causing damage to you and preventing you from acting.

Kyokan.display_help: A shinobi is a master of stealth and assassination. While this power is active you will be very hard to detect, and your first strike out of the shadows will deal extra damage. Even If you manage to regain cover, you can only inflict this surprise attack once every 30 seconds. Even while detected, a shinobi is a deadly foe and able to deal slightly higher damage . This power cant be used at the same time as other stealth powers. Recharge: Very Fast
Kyokan.display_short_help: Toggle: Self Self +DEF(Melee, Ranged, AoE), +Run Speed, +Jump

The_Lotus_Drops.display_help: You perform The Lotus Drops maneuver, attacking all foes in melee range. This attack wounds your opponents, causing them to take moderate damage over time and reduces their Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
The_Lotus_Drops.display_target_help: The Katana has reduced your Defenses.

Kuji-In_Toh.display_help: Kuji-In Toh invokes the power of Toh, or harmony with the universe. Focusing your inner power, you can make your body regenerate and recover endurance for a while. You also gain resistance to psionic attacks and fear protection. Recharge: Long

messages.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} causes you to rapidly recover both health and endurance!
Your {PowerName} causes you to rapidly recover both health and endurance!

Smoke_Flash.display_help: You throw a smoke bomb at your feet. The resulting flash of light and smoke can briefly distract your foes and Placate them so they can no longer find or target you. Enemies will be distracted and confused, making them more vulnerable to attacks for a short time. Recharge: Long
Smoke_Flash.display_target_help: You have been Placated and your resistance has been lowered.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Placate {PlayerDest}.
You Placate {PlayerDest}.
messages.display_victim_hit: The {PowerName} Placates you and you cannot target {PlayerSource}.

Blinding_Powder.display_help: You throw a handful of Blinding powder in a wide arc at your foes. Most foes will be blinded, and unable to see. Some affected targets may be overcome by the powder that they may start attacking their own allies. If you attack the blinded foes, they will be alerted to your presence, but will continue to suffer a penalty to their chance to hit. Recharge: Long
Blinding_Powder.display_target_help: Your have been blinded. You are helpless and confused.

Golden_Dragonfly.display_help: You perform a devastating Golden Dragonfly attack that deals a massive amount of damage and can even knock a foe down to the ground and reduce it's Defense. The power of this attack can actually extend a short distance through multiple foes. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Golden_Dragonfly.display_target_help: The Katana has reduced your Defenses.
